verbs.description: [ARG0: North Korea 's state media] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [V: trumpeted] [ARG1: leader Kim Jong Un 's " immortal achievement " a day after he met South Korean President Moon Jae - in and repeated past vows to remove nuclear weapons from the peninsula and work toward a formal end to the Korean War] .
